attributes.action: Make Teeneagers Aged 16 + When finished compulsory education able to claim for Job Seekers Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Compulsory age for finishing school and joining the world of work is 16.
So why is that 16 + 17 year olds cannot claim for Job Seekers Allowance? 
Employers are looking for staff for their business's yet when someone under the age of 18 comes along they get rejected for not enough experience.
How are we to get the experience?
